attribute_value: Founded in 2010 as the first foundation university in Antalya specializing in STEM and social sciences with English-medium instruction.
Address: Çıplaklı Mah. Akdeniz Bulvarı No:290 A Döşemealtı/Antalya
Faculties: Engineering, Medicine, Social Sciences, Arts
Departments: Computer Engineering, Medicine, Psychology, Graphic Design
Programs: BSc Computer Engineering, MD Medicine, BA Psychology, BFA Graphic Design, MSc Data Science
Academic terms: Fall (Sep-Jan), Spring (Feb-Jun), Summer (Jul-Aug: Optional)
Orientation Week: Sep 1-5, Finals Fall: Dec 15-22, Finals Spring: May 20-27
Vice Chancellors: Prof. Dr. Aysee Kaya, Prof. Dr. Mehmet Demir
